segments.text: I think I've looked everywhere , but I haven't seen a swimming pool here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This hotel has no full-size pool , but we do have swim stations in our gym .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Swim stations ? Whoever heard of such a thing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You swim in a swim station just like you run on a treadmill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All that exercise in a little pool ! Do I have to pay anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The swim stations are available to all guests for no charge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Now can you tell me the hours of operation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're available anytime between 7 a . m . and 10 p . m . , seven days a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! I can't wait to change into my trunks !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The swim stations are very popular , sir . I hope you don't find a line down there .
segments.speaker: S2
